items.title: Awesome Angular
items.content_text:
### Authentication / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [ngx-webauthn (‚≠ê2)](https://github.com/JonnyHeavey/ngx-webauthn) - An Angular library that provides a clean, type-safe abstraction over the native WebAuthn API. Features direct support for standard WebAuthn types with an optional preset system for common scenarios.
items.content_html:
Authentication / Google Developer Experts

  • ngx-webauthn (‚≠ê2) - An Angular library that provides a clean, type-safe abstraction over the native WebAuthn API. Features direct support for standard WebAuthn types with an optional preset system for common scenarios.

items.title: Awesome Polars
items.content_text:
### Python / Miscellaneous

*   [seaborn\_polars (‚≠ê27)](https://github.com/pavelcherepan/seaborn_polars) - Python package to plot Polars DataFrames and LazyFrames with [seaborn](https://seaborn.pydata.org/) by [@pavelcherepan](https://github.com/pavelcherepan).
*   [functime](https://docs.functime.ai/) - Machine learning Python package built on Polars for time-series predictions by [@neocortexdb](https://github.com/neocortexdb). According to the developpers, it's the world's fastest and most feature-full machine learning forecasting library !
*   [polars\_istr (‚≠ê16)](https://github.com/abstractqqq/polars_istr) - Python package for Processing IBAN, ISINs, URLs and other standard format data in Polars by [@abstractqqq](https://github.com/abstractqqq).
*   [catfact (‚≠ê15)](https://github.com/machow/catfact) - Python package for working with categorical data in Polars DataFrames by [@machow](https://github.com/machow).
items.content_html:
Python / Miscellaneous

  • seaborn_polars (‚≠ê27) - Python package to plot Polars DataFrames and LazyFrames with seaborn by @pavelcherepan.
  • functime - Machine learning Python package built on Polars for time-series predictions by @neocortexdb. According to the developpers, it's the world's fastest and most feature-full machine learning forecasting library !
  • polars_istr (‚≠ê16) - Python package for Processing IBAN, ISINs, URLs and other standard format data in Polars by @abstractqqq.
  • catfact (‚≠ê15) - Python package for working with categorical data in Polars DataFrames by @machow.

items.title: Awesome Firebase Genkit
items.content_text:
### Talks / Dart - Official

*   [Dart client for Genkit: Call Genkit Flows from Flutter/Dart - Slides](https://speakerdeck.com/coborinai/dart) - Slides from a lightning talk at Google I/O Extended Tokyo 2025, introducing the Dart client library for calling Genkit flows from Flutter/Dart applications.
*   [Dart client for Genkit: Call Genkit Flows from Flutter/Dart - Video](https://youtu.be/AakdczWQLzY?si=S5aT29miICHWQepM) - Video from a lightning talk at Google I/O Extended Tokyo 2025, introducing the Dart client library for calling Genkit flows from Flutter/Dart applications.
items.content_html:
Talks / Dart - Official

  • Dart client for Genkit: Call Genkit Flows from Flutter/Dart - Slides - Slides from a lightning talk at Google I/O Extended Tokyo 2025, introducing the Dart client library for calling Genkit flows from Flutter/Dart applications.
  • Dart client for Genkit: Call Genkit Flows from Flutter/Dart - Video - Video from a lightning talk at Google I/O Extended Tokyo 2025, introducing the Dart client library for calling Genkit flows from Flutter/Dart applications.

items.content_text:

items.title: Awesome Capacitor
items.content_text:
### Other plugins

*   [Shamir (‚≠ê5)](https://github.com/vault12/capacitor-shamir) - Shamir's Secret Sharing cryptographic algorithm.
*   [capacitor-app-attest (‚≠ê1)](https://github.com/ludufre/capacitor-app-attest) - Apple Attest with Ionic Capacitor
*   [capacitor-live-activities (‚≠ê2)](https://github.com/ludufre/capacitor-live-activities) - Capacitor plugin to use Live Activities on iOS 16.2+.
*   [capacitor-lottie-splash-screen (‚≠ê4)](https://github.com/ludufre/capacitor-lottie-splash-screen) - Capacitor plugin to use Lottie animations as splash screen.
items.content_html:
Other plugins

  • Shamir (‚≠ê5) - Shamir's Secret Sharing cryptographic algorithm.
  • capacitor-app-attest (‚≠ê1) - Apple Attest with Ionic Capacitor
  • capacitor-live-activities (‚≠ê2) - Capacitor plugin to use Live Activities on iOS 16.2+.
  • capacitor-lottie-splash-screen (‚≠ê4) - Capacitor plugin to use Lottie animations as splash screen.

items.title: Awesome Pcaptools
items.content_text:
### Traffic Analysis/Inspection

*   [pcaptoparquet (‚≠ê3)](https://github.com/nokia/pcaptoparquet): pcaptoparquet is a Python package designed for converting PCAP or PCAPNG files to structured data formats, primarily Apache Parquet. The tool focuses on network traffic analysis by extracting, decoding, and transforming packet data into queryable datasets suitable for analysis and visualization. The tool supports both command-line and programmatic interfaces, enabling integration into various network analysis workflows.
items.content_html:
Traffic Analysis/Inspection

  • pcaptoparquet (‚≠ê3): pcaptoparquet is a Python package designed for converting PCAP or PCAPNG files to structured data formats, primarily Apache Parquet. The tool focuses on network traffic analysis by extracting, decoding, and transforming packet data into queryable datasets suitable for analysis and visualization. The tool supports both command-line and programmatic interfaces, enabling integration into various network analysis workflows.

items.title: Awesome Selfhosted
items.content_text:
### Software / Booking and Scheduling

*   [LibreBooking](https://librebooking.readthedocs.io/) - Resource scheduling solution offering a flexible, mobile-friendly, and extensible interface for organizations to manage resource reservations. ([Demo](https://librebooking-demo.fly.dev/), [Source Code (‚≠ê524)](https://github.com/LibreBooking/app)) `GPL-3.0` `PHP/Docker`

### Software / Document Management

*   [Papra](https://papra.app) - Minimalist document storage, management and archiving platform designed to be simple to use and accessible to everyone. ([Demo](https://demo.papra.app/), [Source Code (‚≠ê1.9k)](https://github.com/papra-hq/papra/)) `AGPL-3.0` `Docker`
*   [Signature PDF (‚≠ê580)](https://github.com/24eme/signaturepdf) - Sign and manipulate PDFs with collaboration, organization, compression and metadata editing. ([Demo](https://pdf.24eme.fr/)) `AGPL-3.0` `PHP/deb/Docker`

### Software / Health and Fitness

*   [Wingfit](https://wingfit.fr) - Minimalist fitness app to plan your workouts, track your personal records and leverage smartwatch data. ([Demo](https://wingfit.fr/home), [Source Code (‚≠ê132)](https://github.com/itskovacs/wingfit)) `CC-BY-SA-4.0` `Python/Docker`

### Software / Miscellaneous

*   [Operational.co](https://operational.co) - Receive alerts in a live timeline from your product. ([Demo](https://app.operational.co/?signinas=kevin), [Source Code (‚≠ê333)](https://github.com/operational-co/operational.co)) `AGPL-3.0` `Nodejs/Docker`

### Software / Personal Dashboards

*   [Personal Management System](https://volmarg.github.io/) - Organize the essentials of everyday life, everything from a simple to-do list, and notes up to payments, and schedules. ([Demo (‚≠ê3.4k)](https://github.com/Volmarg/personal-management-system#documentation--demo), [Source Code (‚≠ê3.4k)](https://github.com/Volmarg/personal-management-system)) `MIT` `Docker`

### Software / Status / Uptime pages

*   [Kuvasz Uptime](https://kuvasz-uptime.dev) - Performant, stable uptime & SSL monitoring service that just works. ([Source Code (‚≠ê142)](https://github.com/kuvasz-uptime/kuvasz)) `Apache-2.0` `Docker`
items.content_html:
Software / Booking and Scheduling

  • LibreBooking - Resource scheduling solution offering a flexible, mobile-friendly, and extensible interface for organizations to manage resource reservations. (Demo, Source Code (‚≠ê524)) GPL-3.0 PHP/Docker

Software / Document Management

  • Papra - Minimalist document storage, management and archiving platform designed to be simple to use and accessible to everyone. (Demo, Source Code (‚≠ê1.9k)) AGPL-3.0 Docker
  • Signature PDF (‚≠ê580) - Sign and manipulate PDFs with collaboration, organization, compression and metadata editing. (Demo) AGPL-3.0 PHP/deb/Docker

Software / Health and Fitness

  • Wingfit - Minimalist fitness app to plan your workouts, track your personal records and leverage smartwatch data. (Demo, Source Code (‚≠ê132)) CC-BY-SA-4.0 Python/Docker

Software / Miscellaneous

  • Operational.co - Receive alerts in a live timeline from your product. (Demo, Source Code (‚≠ê333)) AGPL-3.0 Nodejs/Docker

Software / Personal Dashboards

  • Personal Management System - Organize the essentials of everyday life, everything from a simple to-do list, and notes up to payments, and schedules. (Demo (‚≠ê3.4k), Source Code (‚≠ê3.4k)) MIT Docker

Software / Status / Uptime pages

items.title: Free for Dev
items.content_text:
### Storage and Media Processing

*   [Dropshare](https://dropsha.re) - Zero-knowledge file sharing. End-to-end encrypted file sharing with AES-256-GCM encryption, client-side processing, and zero server-side data access. Free uploads for files up to 1GB with no data collection.

### Analytics, Events and Statistics

*   [Repohistory](https://repohistory.com) - Beautiful dashboard for tracking GitHub repo traffic history longer than 14 days. Free Plan allows users to monitor traffic for a single repository.
items.content_html:
Storage and Media Processing

  • Dropshare - Zero-knowledge file sharing. End-to-end encrypted file sharing with AES-256-GCM encryption, client-side processing, and zero server-side data access. Free uploads for files up to 1GB with no data collection.

Analytics, Events and Statistics

  • Repohistory - Beautiful dashboard for tracking GitHub repo traffic history longer than 14 days. Free Plan allows users to monitor traffic for a single repository.

items.title: Awesome Flame
items.content_text:
### Open Source / Casual

items.content_html:
Open Source / Casual
